name: Memoria (itch) (bvv, matit, Izabela "Isnea" Nowakowska, Softywan)
description:
MEMORIA is an interactive story of reminiscence, family and old age. Experience reality through the eyes of a person struggling with a neurodegenerative disorder. Edmund, our protagonist, starts to question the world around him and lose trust in his relatives, even in his own self. Unveil the secrets shrouded by the mysteries of the past. MEMORIA is a first-person, story-driven exploration game, fully voiced with the use of AI generated voiceover and atmospherical soundtrack.
